title: Secret Agent
description: A cybersecurity testing tool for identifying site vulnerabilities using Vertex AI, GCP, Cohere, and LangChain.

title: CPP Tracker
description: A competitive programming tracker to help users track their progress and stats across multiple platforms.

title: Interactive Code Reviewer
description: An interactive code reviewer that integrates with a Raspberry Pi and allows users to annotate and modify code on a whiteboard.

title: Motor Test Driver
description: A motor test driver for STM32 to help test motor performance with precise control and monitoring.
